rows.label: bf06070100_0010
rows.name:
Now, it seems Superbia has been accused
of a unilateral breach of treaty in this matter.

rows.label: bf06070100_0020
rows.name:
Emperor Nefer, I open the floor to you.
Is there anything you wish to say?

rows.label: bf06070100_0030
rows.name:
While we are still conducting investigations
into the cause, it cannot be denied...

rows.label: bf06070100_0040
rows.name:
that weaponry belonging to our forces
was discharged against Invidia.

rows.label: bf06070100_0050
rows.name: Regardless of any possible reason and circumstance...

rows.label: bf06070100_0060
rows.name:
we are prepared to offer recompense
for this grave offence.

rows.label: bf06070100_0070
rows.name: So you want to settle this with money...?

rows.label: bf06070100_0080
rows.name: Sincerely in all aspects.

rows.label: bf06070100_0090
rows.name: Is it my imagination?

rows.label: bf06070100_0100
rows.name:
To my ears, it sounds almost as if you mean
to imply that the blame for these offences...

rows.label: bf06070100_0110
rows.name: does not lie with Your Majesty at all!

rows.label: bf06070100_0120
rows.name:
We are investigating.
I ask that we not draw any hasty conclusions.

rows.label: bf06070100_0130
rows.name: What need is there for investigation?

rows.label: bf06070100_0140
rows.name:
I believe a cause has already been
established. There are witnesses.

rows.label: bf06070100_0150
rows.name: And that would be?

rows.label: bf06070100_0160
rows.name:
What a preposterous notion!
The people you speak of are merely a terrorist group!

rows.label: bf06070100_0170
rows.name: How could they possibly command that measure of-?

rows.label: bf06070100_0180
rows.name: It's the truth.

rows.label: bf06070100_0190
rows.name:
I, Sigurd, swear this in the
name of King Serich Luxuria.

rows.label: bf06070100_0200
rows.name:
Can confirm Ex-Chairman Bahn give
these people some kind of supplies.

rows.label: bf06070100_0210
rows.name:
Military supplies, me thinks.
And in great number, yes.

rows.label: bf06070100_0220
rows.name: But why would...?

rows.label: bf06070100_0230
rows.name:
What if I were to tell you that the
Holy Grail that razed the world 500 years ago,

rows.label: bf06070100_0240
rows.name: Metsu, was involved?

rows.label: bf06070100_0250
rows.name:
Ridiculous.
The legends say he was destroyed and turned to dust.

rows.label: bf06070100_0260
rows.name: He's very much alive, believe me.

rows.label: bf06070100_0270
rows.name: I... ah, no, I have seen him with my own eyes.

rows.label: bf06070100_0280
rows.name: If you still don't believe it...

rows.label: bf06070100_0290
rows.name: A Blade?! But-but that Core Crystal...!

rows.label: bf06070100_0300
rows.name:
This is Hikari, the other Heaven's Holy Grail. 
Your Majesty must have heard of her in legends.

rows.label: bf06070100_0310
rows.name:
So the rumors that reached us were true...
Who is its Driver?

rows.label: bf06070100_0320
rows.name:
If you knew that, I daresay your
surprise would be even greater.

rows.label: bf06070100_0330
rows.name:
But that is not the matter we are here to discuss,
Your Highness. This is a dire situation...
